transcript:
Customer: This is absolutely ridiculous! I've been calling for three days straight and nobody can help me. My internet has been down for a week and I'm losing money every day because I can't work from home!

Technician: I understand your frustration, sir. Let me see what I can do to help. Can you provide me with your account number?

Customer: I've given my account number to five different people already! This is account 12345-67890. I'm sick and tired of repeating myself over and over again.

Technician: I see your account here. I can see there have been several service calls logged. It looks like there's an ongoing outage in your area that our field teams are working on.

Customer: That's exactly what the last person told me three days ago! When is this going to be fixed? I have deadlines to meet and clients calling me asking where their work is. This is costing me thousands of dollars!

Technician: I understand this is very frustrating. The estimated repair time is showing 24-48 hours, but I can't guarantee an exact time. Would you like me to add you to our priority list for updates?

Customer: 24-48 hours?! Are you kidding me? I've already been without service for a week! This is completely unacceptable. I want to cancel my service and get a full refund for this month.

Technician: I can certainly help you with account changes, but let me first see if there are any other options. I could potentially offer you a mobile hotspot device temporarily.

Customer: A mobile hotspot? That's your solution? I need reliable high-speed internet for video conferences and large file uploads. A tiny hotspot isn't going to cut it. This is the worst customer service I've ever experienced.

Technician: I apologize for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, that's the best temporary solution I can offer right now. Would you still like me to process a cancellation request?

Customer: Yes, absolutely. Cancel my service immediately and I want a full refund for this month plus compensation for the lost business. This is unacceptable and I'll be filing a complaint with the FCC.

Technician: I'll start the cancellation process. You should receive confirmation within 24 hours. The billing department will contact you regarding refunds within 3-5 business days.

Customer: This is the last time I'll ever deal with your company. Absolutely terrible service and even worse customer support. I'm telling everyone I know to avoid your company.
